dcterms:description: A multilingual parallel corpus in Indian languages, particularly focusing on tourism and health domains, containing aligned corpora with Hindi as the source language.

dcterms:description: NER tagged data for five Indian languages, aimed at improving Named Entity Recognition performance in low-resource languages through multilingual learning.
